bio: I am a software engineer with a passion for building scalable and efficient systems.

projects.name: Resource Tool
projects.description: Resource Tool is an internal project that helps to manage human resources of Calcey.
role: As a front-end developer, I was responsible for implementing the employee management and resource allocation features.
Involved in Creating new optimized and reusable front-end components, integrating REST APIs and bug fixes.

projects.name: Stampen Media
projects.description: Stampen Media, one of Sweden’s largest media houses, partnered with Calcey to enhance their digital media landscape.
role: As a full stack developer, I was responsible for implementing a new purchase flow which allows users to subscribe to different news sites, e-papers and newspapers.
Involved in implementing new optimized and reusable front-end components, integrating third party services, managing back-end code, and implementing unit tests.
Also involved in communicating with clients in requirement gathering, agile ceremonies and live demos.

projects.name: DirectFN Universal App
projects.description: The DirectFN Universal app is a comprehensive financial trading application designed for investors and traders. It provides access to real-time market data, financial news, and analytics across various global stock exchanges.
role: As a front-end developer, I was responsible for implementing the front-end components for the new features and doing front-end customization according to the client requirements.

projects.name: FitSL App
projects.description: FitSL is a mobile application designed to help users track their fitness goals and progress. It provides a range of features to monitor workouts, track nutrition, and set personalized fitness goals.
role: As a developer, I was responsible for implementing the app UI and logic, integrating Firebase services and integrating PayHere payment gateway.
Also involved in UI/UX design and manualtesting the app in different devices.

projects.name: Winning Product Office
projects.description: The Winning Product Office (WPO) focuses on enhancing the company’s product development capabilities by leveraging data-driven insights, agile methodologies, and collaborative tools to ensure that products meet market demands and client expectations.
role: As a full stack developer, I was responsible for implementing the user dashboard WPO Audit Tool which allows users to manage their software products development process.
Involved in developing scalable UI components along with the backend APIs, and managing scripts for AWS CodePipeline to perform deployments.

extraCurricular.company: Society of Computer Sciences of Sabaragamuwa University of Sri Lanka
Code Night V3.0 intra university hackathon

youtube.description: A channel where I share my voices in the head in video format.

videos.title: Haunted (Horror Short Film)
videos.description: Group of after try to contact non-living entities and face the consequences.

videos.title: Bicycle Ride in Green Heaven
videos.description: I had a crazy thought of riding my bicycle in one of the most beautiful, greenish, chill and scenic roads in Sri Lanka. I’m not talking about mountain cycling. Just a relaxing bicycle ride.

videos.title: Singing Misheard Sinhala Lyrics (වැරදියට ඇහෙන සිංදු)
videos.description: වැරදියට ඇහෙන සිංදු කියලා වැරදියටම කියලා බැලුවා. I sang misheard Sinhala song lyrics.
